comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to NYT a Shelton was Right End for Brown and another Shelton was Left End for Cornell See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9407E3D61638E633A... But his guy is wearing the Cornell uniform, I think. So must be en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murray_Shelton and www.chautauquasportshalloffame.org/murrayshelton.php The last page has a picture that clinches the identification.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq:  Thanks for finding Shelton's full/correct name.  We'll include it next time we update the description.
